mapper.select: SELECT * from DWR_PRODUCT_CT_FIDS where FACTORY = #{FACTORY} and PRODUCTID = #{PRODUCTID} AND PRODUCTTYPE = #{PRODUCTTYPE} AND PERIODDATE = #{PERIODDATE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DWR_PRODUCT_CT_FIDS (FACTORY, PERIODDATE, PRODUCTID, CT_TARGET, TOTAL_CT, TOTAL_GLS_QTY, INTERFACE_TIME, PRODUCTTYPE) VALUES (#{FACTORY},#{PERIODDATE},#{PRODUCTID},#{CT_TARGET},#{TOTAL_CT},#{TOTAL_GLS_QTY},sysdate,#{PRODUCTTYPE})
